## Bee.diluteBatch() method

Dilute given Postage Batch with new depth (that has to be bigger then the original depth), which allows the Postage Batch to be used for more chunks.

For better understanding what each parameter means and what are the optimal values please see \[Bee docs - Keep your data alive / Postage stamps\](https://docs.ethswarm.org/docs/develop/access-the-swarm/introduction/\#keep-your-data-alive).

**Signature:**

```typescript
diluteBatch(postageBatchId: BatchId | Uint8Array | string, depth: number, options?: BeeRequestOptions): Promise<BatchId>;
```
